name: Ruby et Violette's Marshmallow Sticks
recipeIngredient: 12 ounces wafers (in any color you like) for candy coating (see note)
Plastic foam block or another support for the sticks
1 cup or more edible decorations (crushed nonpareils, jimmies, sequins, sprinkles)

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer candy wafers in the top of a double boiler, stirring occasionally (do not let them stiffen). Thread 4 marshmallows on each stick. Cover a square of plastic foam with aluminum foil.

Hold a marshmallow stick over the pan and spoon the melted coating over it, covering it more or less completely. Hold over a piece of wax paper and sprinkle with edible decorations -- the zanier and more colorful the better. Insert the stick into the foam. Repeat with remaining marshmallows. Refrigerate until coating hardens.
